Name: Adaptive Arsenal（Adaptive Arsenal）
Author: Deadman
Description: Adaptive Arsenal is a modification that improves upon existing weapon mechanics within The Long Dark.

Status.patchnotes: For information on the most recent patches, visit here.
Status.notes: For more information, visit the GitHub Repository.

Name: 额外苦难滋生（Additional Misery Spawns）
Author: BigFish
Description: 在苦难模式下添加更多刷新点

Name: Adjustable Walk Speed（Adjustable Walk Speed）
Author: Fuar
Description: 可调节行走速度允许玩家通过滚轮输入来调整行走速度，以便在更具电影感的时刻放慢速度。

Name: 痛苦组件（Affliction Component）
Author: Fuar
Description: 一个允许模组制作者向游戏中添加他们自己的自定义痛苦的框架模组。

Name: 怕黑（Afraid of the Dark）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: 让玩家在夜间感到焦虑。

Name: 酒精修改器（AlcoholMod）
Author: BA
Description: An optional addon for ModComponent enabling the alcohol mechanics. Without this, all alcoholic food functions as if it were non-alcoholic.

Name: All Random Layouts At Once（All Random Layouts At Once）
Author: Romain
Description: This mod allows you to combine all random layouts in the same run.

Status.notes:
Allow to enable in a single save :
* All vanilla lootable buildings
* All prepper caches full

* All snow shelters and campfires
* All vanilla doors for fishing huts
* All mementos
* Both signal fires in HRV

Name: 替代寄生虫，最高等级（Alternative Parasites At Max Lvl）
Author: BaltaZar
Description: 在烹饪等级5时重新引入肠道寄生虫，但以替代的、较温和的影响方式。仅影响烹饪等级为5的角色。

Status.notes: Incremental mode and Fixed mode. Optional reminder to take dose when the real affliction kicks in. Check the Repo for more details!

Name: AlternativeActionUtilities（AlternativeActionUtilities）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 一个用于点击物品时执行自定义操作的实用模组。

Name: 环境光（Ambient Lights）
Author: Thekillergreece
Description: 此模组旨在修改带窗户的内室默认闪电，使其更明亮，以便在白天无需光源即可活动，并且更能反映外部情况（一天中的时间、天气和太阳位置）。

Status.notes: Drop the file into the mods folder.

Name: 伏击狼（Ambush Wolf）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: Creates a new wolf spawn type that hides around the map, waiting for you to walk by...

Name: AmmunitionCraftingTools（AmmunitionCraftingTools）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: 这个模组改进并改变了弹药制作的过程，使其更具挑战性，但也更有趣和回报。

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/AmmunitionCraftingTools

Name: 建筑师（Architect）
Author: Waltz
Description: Modular base building mod

Name: 箭头模组（ArrowMod）
Author: ttr
Description:
Allows to change duration of crafting arrow and arrowhead. Adds additionall crafting options for arrows.

 Game Restart might be required after settingts change.

Name: AudioCore（AudioCore）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 这是一个插件！！！插件！！！插件！！！插件！！！插件！！！插件！！！插件！！！插件！！！

Status.patchnotes: TLD 2.25 fix, made everything more robust

Name: 音频管理器（AudioManager）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description:
Helper mod for using custom audioclips and controlling vanilla audio. 

Disable flare audio, disable waterfall audio adjust wind effect volume (eg. like clattering) when indoors, adjust aurora music volume

Name: Aurora Monitor（Aurora Monitor）
Author: The Illusion
Description: A WIP mod that will eventually allow full control of weather. Currently allows control of Aurorae and will show weather stats in the First Aid screen

Status.notes: This mod will eventually permit management of all weather

Name: Auto Updating Plugin（Auto Updating Plugin）
Author: STBlade
Description: Plugin. Updates most Mods & Plugins automatically.

Name: Beachcombing Adjustments（Beachcombing Adjustments）
Author: ds5678
Description:
Lets you change the loot table for beachcombing.

Patreon

Name: Bedroll Tweaker（Bedroll Tweaker）
Author: Romain
Description:
* Adjust the warmth, the weight, the decay rates for each bedroll type.
* Enable bedrolls to "stack" warmth bonuses

Name: 更好的基础（Better Bases）
Author: Xpazeman
Description: 《漫长的黑暗》模组，允许玩家以多种方式改进他们的基地：大多数家具可以移动（前提是你先清理了杂物），大多数损坏的柜子和抽屉可以修复，室内的大部分杂物可以清除，其中一些也可以移动。

Status.patchnotes:
NEW: Added a system to add custom definitions so new objects can be added to the clutter pool, or modify existing ones
- FIX: Fixed an error thrown on quitting

Name: 更好的相机（Better Camera）
Author: Marcy
Description: Improves the functionality of the camera by allowing to zoom, save photos to disk, and more

Name: 更好的星空（Better Night Sky）
Author: Marcy
Description: Overhauls the night sky with new features by adding meteor showers as well as giving the moon and stars a completely new look.

Name: 更好的技能经验值（Better Skill XP）
Author: Romain
Description: 使用这个模组，技能点是根据（可调整的）做事情所花费的时间来获得的。

Name: 更好的水资源管理（Better Water Management）
Author: STBlade
Description:
Mod improving the way water is managed for The Long Dark.

Installation Instructions

Name: 望远镜（Binoculars）
Author: ds5678
Description:
让你看得更远。

安装说明

Patreon

Name: 出血改版（Bleeding Revamped）
Author: Romain
Description: 重新设计的动物流血机制。

Name: 蓝图清理器（Blueprint Cleaner）
Author: Romain
Description:
- 这个模组为你的制造/烹饪面板增加了些许品质提升。
- 它允许你随时隐藏/显示你想要的蓝图/配方，以便尽可能保持面板的整洁。

Name: 丰富的采集（Bountiful Foraging）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: 在野外寻找食物和有用的材料。

Status.patchnotes: A lot of stuff. Check changelog on the repo.
Status.notes: Unzip the .zip, drop contents in mod folder.

Name: Bow Repair（Bow Repair）
Author: Marcy
Description: 使所有弓箭可修复，具有可自定义的成本和位置。

Name: Caffeinated Sodas（Caffeinated Sodas）
Author: Marcy
Description: Sodas now reduce a slight amount of fatigue. Sodas often contain caffeine, so they're bound to give you at least a little kick, right?

Name: Camping Tools（Camping Tools）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: Tools for outdoors adventures.

Status.patchnotes: Fixed for latest version of the game.
Status.notes: Unzip the .zip, drop contents in mod folder.

Name: Candlelight（Candlelight）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Adds candles and new materials to craft candles

Name: Canister Refill（Canister Refill）
Author: TonisGaming
Description: 为呼吸器使用的空罐加速能力

Status.notes: Drop the file into the mods folder

Name: CanneryManufacturing（CanneryManufacturing）
Author: Varrxion
Description: Designed to improve the usability of the Last Resort Cannery Workshop in Bleak Inlet, especially on Interloper difficulty.

Name: Carcass Yield Tweaker（Carcass Yield Tweaker）
Author: Romain
Description: Allows adjustment of carcass yield and harvesting time.

Status.notes:
* Change amount of available Meat, Guts, and Hide/Feathers upon killing any animal in The Long Dark
* Change the size of quartering bags and the quartering waste amount
* Change Fat to Meat Ratio for each animal

* Allow total harvest time limit change; 1-24 hour range; time bar updates accordingly
* Change the time it takes to quarter each animal
* Change the time it takes to harvest meat from thawed and frozen carcasses (global multiplier))
* Change the time it take to harvest guts (global multiplier)
* Change the time it take to harvest hides and feathers (per animal)
* Change Carcass Decay Rates (per animal, multiplier)
Status.issues:
Few issues with the Harvest panel.
Especially the time displayed.
There's workarounds.

Name: ChangeCustomSettings（ChangeCustomSettings）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Lets you change the difficulty settings of a running game

Name: Choose Starting Gear Redux（Choose Starting Gear Redux）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: REPLACES CHOOSE STARTING GEAR AND DLC-CHOOSE STARTING GEAR-DLC.  Select the items you would like to start the game with.

Name: Choose Starting Location（Choose Starting Location）
Author: Cass
Description: Allows you to choose your starting location when starting a new Sandbox game. 300+ locations, all regions, all difficulty modes. Full instructions in the README.

Status.notes: Use with 2.01 Time Capsule, will not work on game versions >2.02

Name: ChooseStartingCondition-Remastered（ChooseStartingCondition-Remastered）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: A mod for The Long Dark. This mod allows you to choose your starting condition, fatigue, hunger, thirst, warmth, injuries and illnesses when starting a new game.

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/ChooseStartingConditions

Name: Clothing Expanded（Clothing Expanded）
Author: TonisGaming
Description: 增加了一种将配饰与服装结合的方式，以便同时装备更多配饰

Status.issues: Items may get duplicated when combining/uncombining clothing items.

Name: 服装调整器2（Clothing Tweaker 2）
Author: Waltz
Description: Clothing Tweaker reimagined. Allows you to edit clothing stats on the go

Name: Coastal Connection（Coastal Connection）
Author: ds5678
Description: 通过他们共有的道路连接海岸公路和荒凉湾。

Name: Collector Cards（Collector Cards）
Author: Kaiusername
Description: Find a collection of hand-painted cards hidden across Great Bear!

Status.patchnotes: Rebuilt mod from the ground up. Added new cards and new card packs.
Status.notes: Download the .modcomponent and drop it into your 'mods' folder.
Status.issues: Mod will not be able to be translated into other languages until a later update.

Name: 伴侣狼（Companion Wolf）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: 创建一种新的狼 spawn 类型，可以用肉引诱，最终驯服。这个模组开发还处于非常早期的阶段，它足以让幼狼跟随你并成长，但除了在肉食库存中烧个洞之外，没有其他功能性的改变。

Name: Complex Logger（Complex Logger）
Author: The Illusion
Description: A mod that adds more complex logging to the game

Name: 坐标抓取器（Coordinates Grabber）
Author: ds5678
Description:
Utility mod. Allows you to see/copy the name, position, rotation, and scene of interactive items.

Patreon

Name: 美洲狮之声消散（CougarSoundBegone）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Kills the stupid cougar in the main menu on startup

Name: 舒适毯（CozyBlankets）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: Keep you warmer in those cold, winter nights. Original by ds5678.

Status.notes: Unzip the .zip, drop contents in mods folder.

Name: CozyCushions（CozyCushions）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 14 craftable pillows; sit on other objects like chairs, benches, toilets; optional buffs

Name: 任意地创造Redux（Craft Anywhere Redux）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: Allows you to adjust the crafting location for vanilla craftable items.

Name: 修改润色（Crafting Revisions）
Author: STBlade
Description:
** Now Part of ModComponent 7.0.0
Improves the Crafting UI and enables custom Blueprint/Recipe creation.

Name: 制作热键（CraftingHotkey）
Author: BA
Description: 为制作菜单添加快捷键。

Status.notes: Merged into QoL (2.17+)

Name: Custom Save Data Utilities（Custom Save Data Utilities）
Author: ds5678
Description:
用于装备物品的自定义存档数据的实用模块。

Patreon

Name: CustomWhiteout（CustomWhiteout）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: A mod for the Long Dark letting you experience a custom whiteout challenge.

Name: DIY by Santana（DIY by Santana）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: Adds craftable furniture.

Name: Darker Nights（Darker Nights）
Author: Xpazeman
Description: Mod for The Long Dark to make nights darker, giving a new challenge.

Name: Dead Air（Dead Air）
Author: TonisGaming
Description: 强烈建议仅在新存档上使用。将整个大熊转化为有毒荒地，类似于ZoC的化学池。请预期会有问题。

Status.notes: Unzip the downloaded file and place the files into the mods folder
Status.issues:
Sometimes the masks filter doesn't drain
The improvised filter sometimes stops functioning

Name: 开发者控制台（DeveloperConsole）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: A mod that makes Hinterland's developer console accessible in-game. F1 to open / close the console, type 'help' to get a list of commands.

Name: DeveloperConsoleWintermute（DeveloperConsoleWintermute）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 故事模式控制台。请查看发布说明以获取详细说明。

Status.notes: Check release notes for instructions. Wintermute version lacks behind survival version.

Name: 禁用幽闭恐惧症（Disable Cabin Fever）
Author: ds5678
Description:
Disables Cabin Fever in all game modes.

Patreon

Name: Droppable Undroppables（Droppable Undroppables）
Author: Marcy
Description: Drop any item anywhere without restriction. No more undroppable collectibles, cameras, or shortwaves.

Name: DualSenseX（DualSenseX）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Check instructions on github

Name: Dynamic Temperature（Dynamic Temperature）
Author: Fuar
Description: 一个游戏模组，为室内避难所添加动态温度和简化的模拟热力学。让你的安全屋保持温暖！

Name: 动态树（Dynamic Trees）
Author: Fuar
Description: 动态树木会动态地替换树木的叶子纹理，以表现逐渐积累的降雪，为游戏增添另一层次的沉浸感。

Name: Dynamic World（Dynamic World）
Author: Fuar
Description: 添加动态事件，包括地震，使大熊世界感觉更动态，并随时间变化。

Name: 可食用植物（Edible Plants）
Author: Marcy
Description: 用可定制的卡路里和维生素C使收获的植物变得可食用。

Name: Eternal Weather（Eternal Weather）
Author: Deadman
Description: 永恒天气是一个允许玩家将天气从预设的多种状态中更改为无限持续时间状态的修改。

Status.patchnotes: For information on the most recent patches, visit here.
Status.notes: For more information, visit the <a href='https://github.com/Deaadman/EternalWeather

Name: 检查操作API（Examine Actions API）
Author: BA
Description: Modding framework for custom Examine actions.

Name: 扩展的AI框架（Expanded Ai Framework）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: Provides framework needed for new spawn mechanics and AI behaviors.

Status.notes: BACK UP YOUR SAVES!
Status.issues: BETA. Unstable. It crashes. No corruption noted.

Name: Export Journal（Export Journal）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: A mod for The Long Dark (2.51+) which allows the player to export the journal data of the active save game.

Name: Extra Graphics Settings（Extra Graphics Settings）
Author: The Illusion
Description: A mod that adds more options for graphical things.

Status.notes: This mod makes Disable Chromatic Aberration, Enable Status Bar Percentages, Free Look In Cars and Weapon Crosshair obsolete

Name: Extreme Temperature Drop（Extreme Temperature Drop）
Author: The Illusion
Description: 改变温度降解

Name: 更快收获（Faster Harvesting）
Author: The Illusion
Description: Adds customization options to change the time it takes to harvest things

Name: Faster Searching（Faster Searching）
Author: MikeyPdog
Description: Speeds up the search action on containers and makes searching instant for empty containers.

Name: Feat Settings（Feat Settings）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: 公开属性和技能解锁设置。允许解锁传承技能“大猫杀手”。消除通过错误方式（如漏洞或控制台命令）解锁的技能的启动噪音。允许在任何难度级别自定义技能数量。

Name: Filigrani's Skills（Filigrani's Skills）
Author: BA
Description: Custom skill API

Name: 火焰套餐DLC（Fire Pack DLC）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: 用于生火的全新可再燃工具。原作：ds5678 和 WulfMarius。

Status.patchnotes: Added French and Turkish localizations. Updated bowdrill. Updated Russian and Italian localizations. Bug fixes.
Status.notes: Unzip the .zip, drop contents in mod folder.

Name: 火添加组件（FireAddons）
Author: ttr
Description: Smoldering Ash, cooking time based on temperature, different tinder have different fire starting buffs. Details in readme on github.

Name: 修复 Steam Workshop 项目（Fix Steam Workshop Items）
Author: STBlade
Description: Very quick mod to re-enable workshop localization files

Name: Food Pack by 'TKG'（Food Pack by 'TKG'）
Author: Thekillergreece
Description:
Introduces 38 new food items to the game.

This mod was expanded with Waltz's mod in mind so be sure to download that one too!

Status.patchnotes: Version 6.3 - Added a new item and some fixes.
Status.notes: Just drop the content into the mods folder.

Name: Food Tweaker（Food Tweaker）
Author: Romain
Description: Food Tweaker. What does it do? It tweaks food.

Status.issues: Realistic values for Hydration & Vitamin C are missing. You have to set them yourself before starting a new game.

PreviousAuthors: Cass, ttr, Deus, Phaedrus, The Illusion

Name: Foods by 'Calorie Waltz'（Foods by 'Calorie Waltz'）
Author: Waltz
Description:
Adds 20+ unique, delicious food and beverage items. Insludes cute collectibles and handy settings!

Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

Name: ForagersDelight（ForagersDelight）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: Forager's Delight mod adds small (customizable) carry weight buff to some clothing items.

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/Forager-s-Delight

Name: Forge Blueprints DLC（Forge Blueprints DLC）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: More blueprints in the forge. Original by ds5678.

Status.patchnotes: Updated to post DLC update. New crafting icons.
Status.notes: Drop file in mods folder.

Name: Fortified Lookouts（Fortified Lookouts）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: 增加尺寸，添加一个常规尺寸的嵌入式瞭望台，并将窗户抬高，以便Mystery Lake、Coastal Highway和Bleak Inlet的瞭望员获得清晰的视野。

Name: FoxCompanion（FoxCompanion）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: A little fox companion for the lonely TLD player.

Name: FriendlyInlet（FriendlyInlet）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: Make Bleak Inlet more friendly by redistributing wood spawns to the coast and reduce and relocate some wolf spawns.

Name: 冷冻食品（Frozen Food）
Author: Fuar
Description: 冷冻食品旨在通过允许食物物品随时间冻结，为游戏增加一些真实性。

Name: Fuel Manager（Fuel Manager）
Author: The Illusion
Description: Fuel Manager adds QOL features to assist with managing various fuel items. This includes all features of Better-Fuel-Management.

Name: 全速（FullSwing）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 添加选项以修改冰箱门的摆动速度和半径

Name: Gear Decay Modifier（Gear Decay Modifier）
Author: Romain
Description: 为《漫长的黑暗》修改装备腐化速率的模组。设置可以从完全停止腐化到使其变得非常快。有多种类别可供更改。

Name: 齿轮信息（Gear Info）
Author: Waltz
Description: 在您的物品栏中显示额外的装备信息（装备名称旁边有一个小的(i)按钮）

Name: 完美状态齿轮修改器（Gear Perfect Condition Mod）
Author: BaltaZar
Description: Sets condition to 100 for specified looted Gear items. Customizable Json. Default items: Matches, Lamp fuel, Mag lens, Antiseptic, Insulated flasks

Status.notes: This mod is the successor of my former mod, ToolsFullConditionMod

Name: Gear Spawner（Gear Spawner）
Author: STBlade
Description:
** Now Part of ModComponent 7.0.0
Utility mod for spawning modded items.

Name: HUD定位器（HUD Positioner）
Author: Marcy
Description: 允许通过更改它们在屏幕上的锚定位置以及通过模组设置自由调整它们的位置，来对游戏内的UI元素进行扩展自定义。

Status.notes:
Note: keep in mind that the mod does not prevent overlap of UI elements, you can use offsets to prevent UI elements from overlapping if you want them to be anchored to the same part of the screen.
Note no.2: While the mod was tested using different screen resolutions it may cause the UI to offset in an unwated way on certain screen sizes, you can use the offsets in settings to mitigate this effect.

Name: HUDTweaks（HUDTweaks）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: HUD Tweaks mod adds ability to enable or disable certain, potentially annoying, HUD elements via ModSettings.

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/HUDImprovements

Name: 万圣节（Halloween）
Author: TLD Modding Community
Description: Howl-oween - Brought to you by the Discord Modding Community

Name: Harvest Yield Tweaker（Harvest Yield Tweaker）
Author: Fuar
Description: A gameplay mod that allows users to change how much yield breaking down certain items gives.

Name: Hotkey Mod（Hotkey Mod）
Author: BaltaZar
Description: Simple hotkey mod. When equiping firearms, guns with the most bullets in the magazine will be equiped (If in the json list). When equiping torches, the one item with the LEAST codition comes up. The basic rule after the above rules: first item in the list is going to be equiped. Clothes and accessories are supported too, and there is a toggle function implemented, so first tap equips specified clothing item, second tap switches back the original item if there was any. Check the Repo for more details!

Status.patchnotes: Fixed an issue with ruined torches getting selected first.
Status.notes: Check the Repo for more details!

Name: 房屋地下室（House Basements）
Author: ds5678
Description:
Adds some more basements to the game.

Patreon

Status.issues: The scenes required for this mod were removed in 2.03, so this cannot be updated.

Name: House Lights（House Lights）
Author: Marcy
Description: 神奇地让大熊重新获得电力！不再在黑暗中跌跌撞撞地走动！

Name: 如何阅读（How To Read）
Author: The Illusion
Description: This mod is intended to catch users that do not read. This mod shouldnt be installed. If you are reading this, then you passed the test.

Name: Hunger Revamped（Hunger Revamped）
Author: TLD Modding Community
Description: 通过分离饥饿感和储存的卡路里来改进饥饿系统。添加了烹饪的自定义选项，例如启用烹饪毁坏的食品。

Name: Improved Afflictions（Improved Afflictions）
Author: Fuar
Description: Improved Afflictions overhauls and changes many of the afflictions to last longer, provide more deadly affects and make the game more challenging.

Name: 改进服装（Improved Clothing）
Author: Fuar
Description: Adds clothing wetness from walking in snow and ice, animal attacks and a new quick way to place clothing items right off your body.

Name: Improved Cougar（Improved Cougar）
Author: Fuar
Description: 一个围绕美洲狮添加和改变机制的玩法模组

Name: Improved Flasks（Improved Flasks）
Author: Fuar
Description: A gameplay mod that adds new QOL functionality to insulated flasks.

Name: Improved Loading Screens（Improved Loading Screens）
Author: Fuar
Description: 一个改进游戏加载屏幕的模组，通过自定义提示、背景图片以及启用或禁用加载屏幕各种方面的能力。

Name: 改进的放大镜（Improved Magnifying Lens）
Author: Romain
Description: Add a little realism to lighting a fire with a magnifying glass

Name: 为所有人提供更好的休息（Improved Rest For All）
Author: Romain
Description: This mod allows condition recovery from Improved Rest Buff when Condition Recovery During Rest is set to none (Custom Mode).

Name: 改进的配乐（Improved Soundtrack）
Author: Fuar
Description: Improves the in game soundtrack by adding new conditions to play rare or removed music tracks from the OST. Including new location discovered stingers.

Status.issues: Not updated for TFTFT Expansion Update

Name: 改进的故事（Improved Tales）
Author: Fuar
Description: Improves the Signal Void Tale with QOL customization options.

Name: 室内温度（In Door Temps）
Author: ttr
Description: Indoor temps are aligned with outdoor ones. Shelters (snow, cars, caves) do not add flat bonus anymore.

Name: Indoor Campfires（Indoor Campfires）
Author: Xpazeman
Description: This mod allows you to create campfires indoors.

Name: Indoors Greenery（Indoors Greenery）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: Make your own indoor farm and regrow plants.

Status.patchnotes: Fixed for latest version of the game.
Status.notes: Unzip the .zip, drop contents in mod folder.

Name: 无限作弊死亡（Infinite Cheat Death）
Author: Marcy
Description: Allows infinite amount of respawns. Penalties for cheating death are not removed.

Name: InfiniteFires（InfiniteFires）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Set fires to infinite duration with middle mousebutton

Name: 室内墙饰（Interior Wall Decorations）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: 让我们用图片装饰你的基地，并上传你自己的图片。

Name: Interloper Region Selection（Interloper Region Selection）
Author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
Description: This mod lets you select the spawn region in Interloper mode.

Name: InventoryReassignments（InventoryReassignments）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: This is a mod for The Long Dark that allows players to reassign various gear items to different inventory categories.

Name: 物品堆（Item Piles）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: 为堆叠物品添加蓝图。

Name: Item Rarities（Item Rarities）
Author: Deadman
Description: 物品稀有度是一个模组，它为《漫长的黑暗》中的每件物品都增添了一种独特性。

Status.patchnotes: For information on the most recent patches, visit here.
Status.notes: For more information, visit the GitHub Repository.

Name: ItemPicker（ItemPicker）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description:
Skip item inspection on picking up stick/stones or other items.

Mass pickup of all sticks/stones or other items in a radius around you. With or without calorie cost.

Full customizable.

Name: 跳跃（Jump）
Author: Waltz
Description: 允许你跳跃。也有一些设置。通过将其拖入 .../Mods/ 进行安装。

Name: Kerosene Lamp Tweaks（Kerosene Lamp Tweaks）
Author: Romain
Description: Modify the rates of fuel consumption for kerosene lamps, add decay for them and change the color they emit.

Name: Keyboard Utilities（Keyboard Utilities）
Author: ds5678
Description:
A utility mod that enables other mods to more easily use keyboard and mouse input.

Patreon

Name: 皮革制品（Leatherworks）
Author: TonisGaming
Description: Adds a way to renew leather from hide, the ability to make certain leather clothing, and adds tree bark, that can be utilized for many different utilities, like flour, food and string

Status.notes: Unzip the downloaded file, then drop the files into the mods folder. Also has a Camping Tools version

Name: 无限容器空间（Limitless Container Space）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: Increases the capacity of all containers to 10000KG

Name: Lithar's Ridge（Lithar's Ridge）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: A hidden ridge in Bleak Inlet with a cozy hut, scenic overlooks, and a path for explorers to discover.

Name: 利瑟尔斯修复（LitharsMending）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Lets you repair ruined clothing items

Name: Localization Utilities（Localization Utilities）
Author: STBlade
Description:
** Now Part of ModComponent 7.0.0
Utility mod for localized text.

Name: LonelyOrca（LonelyOrca）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 一个经典的模组移植到了DLC后的TLD。一只孤独的虎鲸生活在荒芜角。

Name: Maintain Yourself（Maintain Yourself）
Author: Deus
Description: This adds options to customize condition gain. This can make condition recovery much harder or easier, by making recovery proportional to your needs.

Name: Map Maker Tools（Map Maker Tools）
Author: ds5678
Description: Mod aiding in mapping the terrain for The Long Dark

Name: Map Manager（Map Manager）
Author: The Illusion
Description:
显示玩家箭头
以玩家为中心
显示地图
勘测映射选项：
- 修改范围
- 修改勘测时间
- 自动使用Polaroid（即使你没有它们）
自动将尸体添加到地图上

Name: 工具箱（Meh Tool Box）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: 一个供模组制作者在他们模组中使用的工具箱。

Name: 自定义游戏中的痛苦（Misery in Custom Games）
Author: BigFish
Description:
为任何自定义游戏运行添加自定义设置以启用痛苦折磨。  
原版：常规痛苦时间线  
OnSpawn：开始一个所有折磨都已应用的运行

Name: Mod Data（Mod Data）
Author: STBlade
Description: A utility mod for TLD that lets other mods save data independently of the save file.

Name: ModComponent（ModComponent）
Author: STBlade
Description:
Now includes GearSpawner,CraftingRevisions,LocalizationUtilities built in.

Utility Mod; lets you load external item packs.

Name: ModSettings（ModSettings）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description:
Lets other mods display their settings in-game. This mod doesn't do anything on its own and should only be used as a dependency for other mods.

Thanks zeobviouslyfakeacc, for all your work!

Name: 模组制作者工具箱（Modders' Gear Toolbox）
Author: Jods-Its
Description: This mod aims to help other modders by adding 'generic' materials and tools for them to use in their mods. Full list of items in the GitHub repo.

Status.notes: Unzip the .zip, drop contents in mod folder.

Name: Moment（Moment）
Author: BA
Description: 用于模组监控游戏内时间和安排事件的工具。

Name: MooseSatchelMod（MooseSatchelMod）
Author: ttr
Description: 如果佩戴麋鹿包，可减少肉、鱼、肠和馅饼的气味和腐烂。

Name: More Camera Spawns（More Camera Spawns）
Author: Fuar
Description: A gameplay mod that adds new spawns for the instant camera around Lower Great Bear

Name: 更多烹饪机位（More Cooking Slots）
Author: Marcy
Description: Ever wonder why you can't fit more than 2 pots on a fire barrel? Well, now you can! This mod adds more cooking slots to certain fire sources.

Name: More Locked Doors（More Locked Doors）
Author: Fuar
Description: Adds more locks to doors and buildings around the game world.

Name: MoreWood（MoreWood）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: This mod adds two new types of wood. Birch - Similar to Cedar. Spawns in birch forests. Oak - similar to Fir.  Can be found around Oak tress and randomly spawns in forests.

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/MoreWood

Name: MotionTracker（MotionTracker）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Adds a minimap that can show animals and spraypaint markings

Status.patchnotes: TLD 2.17 fix, Ptarmigans added, size reduced

Name: Muscle（Muscle）
Author: BA
Description: Eat well, move a lot and properly sleep, then you will gain muscle.

Name: Non-OP Torches（Non-OP Torches）
Author: Deus
Description: This mod makes torches less overpowered.

Name: NorthernLightsBroadcast（NorthernLightsBroadcast）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: Watch your favorite movies and series in TLD

Status.notes: *.mp4 or *.avi files recommended. Videoplay uses installed codecs. Can be hit and miss, webm *could* maybe work too, feedback about working formats appreciated

Name: 诺福克服装包（Northfolk Clothing Pack）
Author: Waltz
Description:
Adds 2 previously seen + 3 brand new, inspired by northern folk, craftable clothes.

It's a standard ModComponent pack, installed by dropping it into .../Mods/

Name: NotSoSilly（NotSoSilly）
Author: BA
Description: Enable physics for gears placed down for 10 seconds so you can drop your stuff around naturally, or pile up items with the power of gravity. Aims to be practical to use in Survival. Still somewhat risky, check readme for proper usage.

Name: Pastime Reading（Pastime Reading）
Author: Waltz
Description:
Adds a readable, customizable book with animations and stuff.

Showcasing video. Detailed review(has subtitles).

Mod is installed by extracting .zip into .../Mods/

Name: Pathfinders Ascent（Pathfinders Ascent）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: An alternate version of Timberwolf Mountain, Blackrock, and Ash Canyon designed to offer a fresh and challenging experience for veteran survivors.

Name: Pause In Journal（Pause In Journal）
Author: Romain
Description: The game will be paused in any category of the Journal

Name: 皮米坎 较慢的腐败（Pemmican Slower Decay）
Author: BaltaZar
Description: Simple mod modifying the cooked Pemmican bar, lowering its decay rate to match cured meat's.

Status.notes: Works with GearInfo. Added a patch for Gear Decay Modifier mod by Romain to exclude Pemmican bars from that mod, because Pemmican is different than a rabbit pie!

Name: Personality（Personality）
Author: Waltz
Description:
Lets you customize your character: replace textures and change outfit.

Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

Name: 一张亲人的照片（Photo of a Loved One）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: Allows you to carry a customizable picture of something you care about.

Name: Pick Water From Fishing Holes（Pick Water From Fishing Holes）
Author: Romain
Description: Collect an unlimited amount of non-potable water from freshwater fishing holes.

Name: Pine Needle Tea（Pine Needle Tea）
Author: Marcy
Description: Harvest pine fascicles and brew them into a tea high in Vitamin C. Everything is customizable.

Name: Placing Anywhere（Placing Anywhere）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 《漫长的黑暗》模组，移除放置物品时的限制，并添加控制来旋转和定位物体。

Name: 植物收获调整器（Plant Harvest Tweaker）
Author: Marcy
Description: Customize everything about plant harvesting: time, required tools, tool degreadation, yield amount.

Name: Predator Spawn Selector（Predator Spawn Selector）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: Enable or disable predator spawns by region and select which type of wolves or bears for each region. ***This mod replaces both Remove Cougars and Timberwolves Anywhere***

Name: QoL（QoL）
Author: BA
Description: 减少界面挫败感，甚至使其使用起来令人愉悦。现在您大部分时间都可以使用键盘来控制您的游戏。

Status.notes: Checking the readme is 100% required to properly use this mod.

Name: RN-Stripped functions（RN-Stripped functions）
Author: RN mod
Description: Carcass moving and Light torches from electricals - extracted from Relentless Nights mod (check it out!)

Name: Radial Menu Utilities（Radial Menu Utilities）
Author: The Illusion
Description: A utility mod that adds the ability for other mods to create custom radial menus.

Name: Random Main Menu（Random Main Menu）
Author: Xpazeman
Description: This mod randomizes the time and weather in the main menu screen so it changes everytime you enter it.

Name: Randomize Interloper Rare Spawns（Randomize Interloper Rare Spawns）
Author: ds5678
Description:
Disables the Interloper loot tables and replaces them with new random spawns. Do not use on existing saves.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

Name: Rare-Exclusive Loot（Rare-Exclusive Loot）
Author: Thekillergreece
Description: Items available in Bunkers and/or Trader now appear in the world, albeit rare and in low numbers.

Status.notes: Drop the file into the mods folder.

Name: 峡谷桥修复（Ravine Bridge Fix）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: Fix the bridge in the Ravine..

Name: Recipe Requirements（Recipe Requirements）
Author: Ezinw
Description: 允许玩家调整制作特定食谱所需的烹饪技能等级。

Name: 录制工具（Recording Utils）
Author: BigFish
Description:
为录制目的添加了一些动物和相机控制功能。 
此外，还添加了@Digitalzombie的freebird实现。

Status.notes:
Commands:
- animal_freeze
  - toggles animation freeze in radius
  - is affected by animal control radius
- animal_wander
  - makes all animals in radius wander to current cam position
  - is affected by animal control radius in mod settings
- cam_freebird
  - toggles freebird cam on/off
- cam_save
  - saves current camera position and rotation
  - is tied to scene. can only load a save while in same scene
  - only works in freebird or flymode
- cam_load
  - loads last saved camera position and rotation
  - is tied to scene. can only load a save while in same scene
  - only works in freebird or flymode

Settings:
- animal control radius, key bindings
- flymode slow, normal and fast speed
- freebird cam settings

Name: 减少掉落物（Reduced Loot）
Author: Fuar
Description: Reduced Loot reduces the amount of certain items in the world by despawning them when they randomly spawn.

Name: Relentless Night（Relentless Night）
Author: ShieldHeart
Description:
TLD 2.23 use RN 4.7.2, TLD 2.19 use RN 4.7.1, TLD 2.10+ use RN 4.6.3, TLD 2.06&2.08 use RN 4.6.1
The spin of the earth is slowing. Days and nights are getting longer. Every long night gets colder and harsher than the last. Nowhere is safe from the cold. How long will you survive in this eerie new world?

You can keep up with mod discussion, updates, and report any issues at our Relentless Mods discord channel with this - INVITE.

Status.patchnotes: Relentless Night updated to work with latest build of game - 2.23.

Name: RelicsOfTheQuietApocalypse（RelicsOfTheQuietApocalypse）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: Relics of the Quiet Apocalypse mod brings back GearItem textures from the older builds of TLD. (Can be customized via ModSettings.)

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/RelicsOfTheQuietApocalypse

Name: Remember Break Down Item（Remember Break Down Item）
Author: Romain

Name: 可再生气枪模（Renewable Gunpowder Mod）
Author: BaltaZar
Description: Adds gunpowder materials: Dusting Sulfur, Stump Remover and Lead to loot pools via beachcombing and container loot tables. I made this mod before I realized AmmunitionCraftingTools mod by Sm4rtBoyTom made better job at making gunpowder renewable. Never mind, someone might use it.

Status.notes: Check the Repo for more details!

Name: 可修复的 可修复物（RepairableRepairables）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: 可修复的，为您提供修复、制作和磨利所使用的三种基本工具的修复选项。可以修复的工具如下：步枪清洁套件、缝纫套件、磨刀石/磨刀石

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/Repairable-Repairables

Name: Reroll Burnt Buildings（Reroll Burnt Buildings）
Author: Cass
Description: Adds console commands that allow you to reroll the random burnt building spawns. Now also includes the random fishing hut doors. Full instructions in the README.

Name: Research Book Tweaker（Research Book Tweaker）
Author: Romain
Description: Formely Shorter Read Intervals Mod

Name: Retrieve Bullets Mod（Retrieve Bullets Mod）
Author: BaltaZar
Description:
这个模组让你可以从用枪杀死的动物身上回收子弹。
你可以从尸体上采集一种叫做“损坏的子弹”的新物品，然后在弹药工坊里将其重新锻造。

Status.notes: Check the Repo for more details!

Name: Retro Food Pack（Retro Food Pack）
Author: Thekillergreece
Description: 23 Retro Food items.

Status.notes: Drop the files into the mods folder.

Name: Rich Presence（Rich Presence）
Author: Atmudia
Description: Rich Presence for The Long Dark.

Name: 在后台运行（RunInBackground）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 保持游戏运行，即使它失去焦点

Name: Safehouse Customization Plus（Safehouse Customization Plus）
Author: Waltz
Description:
Enables customization everywhere, allows to move and pick up containers, stoves, workbenches and many more.

WARNING! Consider this mod expeimental. There was no reports of losing item, but the possibility is still there. Make save backups just in case

Name: 保存图像过滤器（Save Image Filter）
Author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
Description: Saves and reloads your chosen image filter (Options > Display > Image Filter) instead of reverting to 'no filter' every time the game is restarted.

Name: Save Manager（Save Manager）
Author: The Illusion
Description: Adds the ability to save, load and autosave in Sandbox/Survival using hotkeys. Also adds the ability to autosave

Status.notes: Currently does not re-add the buttons in the pause menu
Status.issues: Does not respect save safety (expect this to change in the next major update)

Name: 安全保存（Save Safety）
Author: BA
Description: This mod keep you notifed on failed saving/loading to avoid save corruption.

Name: 缩放鱼模组（Scaled Fish Mod）
Author: BaltaZar
Description: Have you ever wondered why fishes are the same size per type visually? Well, no more! Scaled Fish Mod makes fishes' model size dynamic based on their weight.

Name: 老滑头闯入者（Seasoned Interloping）
Author: ds5678
Description:
为入侵者起始区域列表添加了被遗弃机场、荒凉入海口、污染区及破碎通道。

Patreon

Name: 庇护所温度调整（Shelter Temperature Tweaks）
Author: Cass
Description: Allows you to tweak the temperature of shelters that have NO LOADING SCREEN, such as the Mountaineer's Hut. Full instructions in the README.

Name: 射击场（Shooting Range）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: Enable shooting range targets, weather vane, hunting blind, and a warm barn near Pensive Pond in Pleasant Valley.

Name: Shortcuts（Shortcuts）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: 为某些区域添加了多种快捷方式。您需要重新加载游戏才能使更改生效。

Name: Silent Protagonist（Silent Protagonist）
Author: Cass
Description: Silences player character voice. Full instructions in the README.

Status.notes: Use with 2.01 Time Capsule, will not work on game versions >2.02

Name: 傻模（Silly Mod）
Author: Waltz
Description:
Enables fun: gear items physics, collisions and more

Don't use it on your normal save, you'll regret it

Name: 简单的保存和恢复工具（Simple save and restore tool）
Author: Tactical Ex
Description: 描述：一个简单工具，使备份和恢复《The Long Dark》生存游戏存档更加方便。注意：这是一个外部工具，不是模组，使用时不需要模组加载器。

Status.patchnotes:
Bug fixes
Resolved an issue that would prevent backups from being created if the source path, backup path or app installation path had a space in it.
Readme typos resolved

Improvements
New UI theme utilizing colors and fonts from the game
ReadMe updated to clarify the restore process
Code comment cleanup and typo fixing

Name: Skill Adjustment（Skill Adjustment）
Author: Ezinw
Description: Allows the player to adjust the skill benefits for each level.

Name: 平底锅在径向（SkilletInRadial）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: 这个名字就说明了所有……它在径向面板中添加了煎锅

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/SkilletInRadial?tab=readme-ov-file

Name: Skip Intro Redux（Skip Intro Redux）
Author: STBlade
Description:
允许玩家在开始游戏时跳转到主菜单。

自行承担风险 - 现在可以跳过那些烦人的免责声明。

Name: Sky Co-op（Sky Co-op）
Author: Filigrani
Description: Multiplayer mod for the game

Status.issues: SkyCoop.modcomponent file is known to be corrupted
Status.notes: Current release of the mod only works on The Long Dark Version 2.02 or 2.01
Status.patchnotes: Current release of the mod only works on The Long Dark Version 2.02 or 2.01

Name: SleepWithoutABed（SleepWithoutABed）
Author: Ezinw
Description: 允许玩家在不使用床或床卷的情况下睡觉。通过径向菜单中的“消磨时间”选项访问。

Name: Solitaire（Solitaire）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 用风格浪费你的时间——玩纸牌游戏

Name: Solstice（Solstice）
Author: Romain
Description: Add seasons into TLD

Name: Sonic Mode（Sonic Mode）
Author: Waltz
Description: Allows you to go fast. Has additional settings for stamina recovery

Name: Sprainkle（Sprainkle）
Author: The Illusion
Description: A new and improved mod that entirely replaces the old ankle sprain mod. This mod contains separate settings for ankle and wrist sprains as well as settings for general sprains

Name: Stack Manager（Stack Manager）
Author: The Illusion
Description: 为更多物品添加堆叠功能

Name: stalkeraidsandsupplements（StalkerAidsAndSupplements）
Author: Sm4rtBoyTom
Description: 这个模组扩展了TLD的医学GEAR物品。有些物品受到S.T.A.L.K.E.R系列的启发。

Status.notes: https://github.com/Sm4rtBoyTom/StalkerAidsAndSupplements/releases/tag/v2.2.0

Name: Storage Problem（Storage Problem）
Author: BA
Description: Make container management a minigame.

Name: Story Mode Collectibles（Story Mode Collectibles）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: Adds collectible items from Wintermute into survival mode.

Name: Stretch Armstrong（Stretch Armstrong）
Author: TLD Modding Community
Description: Change the range at which you can interact with things.

Name: StruggleTweaks（StruggleTweaks）
Author: ttr
Description: Set chance to instantly kill wolf after struggle or change bleedout time for wolf. Also you can change tap power to save your mouse buttons

Name: Sun Orientation Fixes（Sun Orientation Fixes）
Author: Cass
Description: Fixes the sun orientation in several regions. Now all regions should be consistent with each other and the world map.

Status.notes: Go to repo for older game versions

Name: Survivor Knowledge（Survivor Knowledge）
Author: Fuar
Description: 通过将制作配方和采集行为锁定在技能等级之后来模拟幸存者知识。

Name: Survivor's Legacy（Survivor's Legacy）
Author: BA
Description: 启用最基本的多玩家交互：允许其他玩家找到你的尸体（某种程度上的）。

Status.notes: It won't be easy to find one if not many people playing with this.

Name: TLD-香烟（TLD-Cigarettes）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: Adds usable Cigarettes

Name: TLD-Morphine（TLD-Morphine）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: Adds Morphine as a usable item

Name: TLD-WolfskinScarf（TLD-WolfskinScarf）
Author: Atlas Lumi
Description: 添加了一种新的可制作的狼毛围巾。

Name: Target Practice & Master Hunter（Target Practice & Master Hunter）
Author: Romain
Description:
Target Practice : Provides a bunch training features allowing you to practice and have fun.
Master Hunter : Offers numerous options to block your automatic, effortless progression through skill levels, ensuring that you earn them more.
See ReadMe for more details.

Name: 长发育区 (TLDev) 区域（The Long Development (TLDev) Regions）
Author: Kaiusername
Description: 《漫长的开发》是一个小团队模组项目，旨在以美观且平衡的方式扩展《漫长的黑暗》中的大熊岛。

Status.notes: This content is in EARLY ACCESS. Please report all issues to our bug tracker forum on the TLDev Discord!

Name: 要做的事（Things To Do）
Author: BA
Description: Demo mod for EAAPI, provides some useful actions.

Name: Timescale Hotkey（Timescale Hotkey）
Author: Waltz
Description: Allows you to either speed up or slow down time by pressing a configurable hotkey

Name: Tin Can Improvements（Tin Can Improvements）
Author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
Description: Allows you to craft 4 tin cans into 1 scrap metal, reduces the weight of tin cans to 0.05 kg, fixes a canned food item weight bug.

Name: 微调：掩埋尸体（Tiny Tweaks: Bury Corpses）
Author: Waltz
Description:
REDUNDANT since Safehouse Customization has same function. But still works

Get rid of those nasty corpses by right-clicking on them

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Correct Drop Orientation（Tiny Tweaks: Correct Drop Orientation）
Author: Waltz
Description: Fix dropped wooden matches and rifle to be in correct orientation. Because yes, they were incorrect

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Extended FOV（Tiny Tweaks: Extended FOV）
Author: Waltz
Description: Extend FOV slider to 150

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Fall Death Goat（Tiny Tweaks: Fall Death Goat）
Author: Waltz
Description: Disables fall death triggers but doubles fall damage (can be tweaked)

Name: 微调：地图文本轮廓（Tiny Tweaks: Map Text Outline）
Author: Waltz
Description: Outline text on the map, so you can actually see what it says. Has a few variants

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Pause On Radial（Tiny Tweaks: Pause On Radial）
Author: Waltz
Description: Slows down time when bringing up radial menus

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Plants Regrow（Tiny Tweaks: Plants Regrow）
Author: Waltz
Description: 现在植物将在45天后重新生长（可以更改）

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Run With Lantern（Tiny Tweaks: Run With Lantern）
Author: Waltz
Description: Removes restrictions on lantern animation: allows movement and removes camera lock

Name: Tiny Tweaks: Wakeup Call（Tiny Tweaks: Wakeup Call）
Author: Waltz
Description: Allows you to interrupt sleep at will. Has an option to wake up when aurora starts, and a few more

Name: Toggle HUD（Toggle HUD）
Author: ds5678
Description:
Allows the player to toggle the scent and time-of-day indicators instead of them disappearing after some time.

Patreon

Name: Tool Upgrade（Tool Upgrade）
Author: TonisGaming
Description: Adds alternate ways of acquiring item variants and other items by way of blueprints

Status.notes: Unzip the downloaded file, then drop the files into the mods folder, also has a Candlelight version

Name: 工具质量（ToolsQuality）
Author: ttr
Description: 保持你的工具锋利。工具状况低会增加执行动作的时间。调整尸体/树枝的收获时间倍数。

Status.notes: Please remove QuickerWoodCutting mod as it's redundant to this. Should work with Harvest Yield Tweaker.

Name: Torch Tweaker（Torch Tweaker）
Author: Romain
Description: Tweaks a few torch parameters and allow the player to lit torches from lanterns

Name: Tracking Wolf（Tracking Wolf）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: Creates a new wolf spawn type that tracks you across the map, no matter your scent level. Watch your back!

Name: Unique Knowledge（Unique Knowledge）
Author: BA
Description: Read each book only once.

Name: UnityExplorerTLD（UnityExplorerTLD）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: UnityExplorer针对TLD的优化

Name: Universal Tweaks（Universal Tweaks）
Author: Deadman
Description: Universal Tweaks is a mod for The Long Dark that enhances existing gameplay elements by modifying them in a way that just make sense.

Status.patchnotes: For information on the most recent patches, visit here.
Status.notes: For more information, visit the GitHub Repository.

DisplayName: Use The Worst First And Drop Stone
Name: Use The Worst First And Drop Stone（Use The Worst First And Drop Stone）
Author: Romain
Description:
Allows you to use the worst condition items first in radial menu and other cases.
Allows you to drop stones/tinders instead of decoy to mark paths. 
See ReadMe for more details.
Aliases: Use The Worst First And Drop Stone

Name: 维生素C追踪器（Vitamin C Tracker）
Author: The Illusion
Description: 终于知道你有多少维生素C了！你将不再生活在无知之中！

Name: Wandering Wolf（Wandering Wolf）
Author: MonsieurMeh
Description: 创建一种新的狼生成类型，让它在地图上四处游荡，而不是待在小区域内。

Name: Watches（Watches）
Author: Deadman
Description: 一项改变《漫漫长夜》中时间计量方式的修改。

Name: WildFire（WildFire）
Author: MooseMeat
Description: 这是一个《漫长的黑暗》模组，它为篝火添加了颜色、烟雾和火花的自定义功能，还引入了6件新装备，并使一些原版物品可以燃烧。

Name: 野生动物调谐（Wildlife Tuning）
Author: BA
Description: TLD mod that randomizes animal behavior configurations.

Name: Wolves Come Out At Night（Wolves Come Out At Night）
Author: Cass
Description: Prevents wolves spawning during the day. Can set by region or to apply everywhere. Full instructions in the README.

Name: Wooden Statues by 'TKG'（Wooden Statues by 'TKG'）
Author: Thekillergreece
Description: Introduces 4 wooden animal statues, small and large.

Status.notes: Just drop the contents into the mods folder.

Name: Working Clocks（Working Clocks）
Author: Xpazeman
Description: 《漫长的黑暗》的一个模组，让游戏中的部分时钟可以工作。

Name: Yes I Know（Yes I Know）
Author: Digitalzombie
Description: 禁用项目和/或火焰上的悬停文本
